name: Henry Nguyen
about: I'm a software engineer studying computer science at UCLA and pursuing a master's in computer science at USC, graduating in 2028. I enjoy building clean, intuitive web experiences and connecting thoughtful design with reliable, scalable systems.

Currently, I'm a software engineer intern at the Garrick Institute for the Risk Sciences, where I build modular React components and connect frontend interfaces to Python ML pipelines to support research workflows.
Previously, I worked with the Daily Bruin at UCLA, where I refactored parts of the website with React and Tailwind and shipped dynamic event pages for more than 5,000 daily readers.
Outside of work, you can usually find me playing volleyball or making music!
